9.1.why: 9.1 builds a solid base so sustained focus is possible; that's Arcturus core containment and setup of a stable work field to calm scattered energy.

9.2.why: 9.2 can lock into one task with surgical depth and will block interruption to protect that focus, which mirrors Arcturus core boundarying to keep the field clean.

9.3.why: 9.3 burns itself out on the wrong stuff to learn what actually matters, which is Arcturus-style iterative calibration of where energy should and should not go.

9.4.why: 9.4 filters the noise for everyone and tells the group 'this matters, that doesn't,' which is Arcturus core attention triage and collective field focusing.

9.5.why: 9.5 gets called in to streamline chaos and is then blamed as controlling, which is Arcturus shadow fixer-projection and scapegoat load.

9.6.why: 9.6 lives as proof that disciplined focus becomes mastery and can judge people who can't match it; that's Arcturus core long-haul regulation with a hint of clinical superiority.

10.1.why: 10.1 builds personal behavior around self-respect and honor; that's self-identity ethics, not trauma-field stabilization or nervous-system regulation (Arcturus).

10.2.why: 10.2 just exists as themselves and withdraws if told to 'perform authenticity,' which is sovereignty of identity, not structured containment of group dysregulation (Arcturus).

10.3.why: 10.3 learns who they are by messing up in public and rebuilding; that's identity experimentation, not calming a chaotic field for others (Arcturus).

10.4.why: 10.4 becomes the behavioral template the group copies, enforcing 'this is how we act,' which echoes Arcturus core protocol-setting of acceptable conduct for stability.

10.5.why: 10.5 is expected to restore integrity for everyone and gets crucified if it doesn't land, which is Arcturus shadow healer-projection and blame.

10.6.why: 10.6 holds long-term self-honoring standards and can act 'above your drama,' which matches Arcturus shadow clinical distance / superior regulator posture.

11.1.why: 11.1 quietly gathers and organizes ideas until they're safe and coherent to share, which is Arcturus core creating mental order so the room calms down.

11.2.why: 11.2 can explain possibilities in a way people immediately get, which is Arcturus core translating confusion into a stabilizing narrative.

11.3.why: 11.3 throws half-baked narratives into the wild just to see what sticks; that's exploratory messaging, not nervous-system de-escalation or protocol repair (Arcturus).

11.4.why: 11.4 gives the tribe a shared story that orients everyone, which is Arcturus core field alignment through narrative coherence.

11.5.why: 11.5 is asked to 'answer our confusion' and then accused of manipulation if people don't like the answer, which is Arcturus shadow scapegoated clarity-bringer.

11.6.why: 11.6 holds the long-arc myth of where we're going and risks sounding like an untouchable oracle, which is Arcturus shadow elevated-knower distance.

12.1.why: 12.1 will not speak unless the emotional field feels clean and safe, which is Arcturus core trauma-aware restraint to avoid re-injuring the room.

12.2.why: 12.2 broadcasts a magnetic, intimate voice when open, but that's raw emotional impact/attraction rather than structured de-escalation or containment (Arcturus).

12.3.why: 12.3 blurts messy truth and can perform pain for attention, which spikes volatility instead of stabilizing it (not Arcturus).

12.4.why: 12.4 translates emotional intensity so the circle can actually stay together, which is Arcturus core crisis de-escalation / nervous-system soothing for the group.

12.5.why: 12.5 is pushed to say the thing nobody else can and then gets accused of manipulation, which is Arcturus shadow high-pressure spokesperson / blame sink.

12.6.why: 12.6 times truth like a surgical intervention and withholds constant output, which is Arcturus core precision-release to prevent emotional overload.

13.1.why: 13.1 quietly holds other people's secrets and carries that weight, which is Arcturus core trauma containment / safe storage of the field's pain.

13.2.why: 13.2 becomes the person everyone unloads on and eventually resents being used as an emotional dump, which is Arcturus shadow burnout-healer pattern.

13.3.why: 13.3 absorbs messy human stories firsthand and risks living in 'everything is heavy,' which is Arcturus shadow trauma saturation / compassion fatigue.

13.4.why: 13.4 speaks for what the group has lived so the pattern is known, which is Arcturus core integration of collective trauma into useful memory.

13.5.why: 13.5 is relied on to explain what went wrong and how not to repeat it, then scapegoated if egos get bruised; that's Arcturus shadow post-crisis analyst getting blamed.

13.6.why: 13.6 holds 'here is our true story' at civilization scale, which is Arcturus core long-range trauma integration so the system stops re-wounding itself.

14.1.why: 14.1 defines how money/energy should flow and can hoard from fear; that's resource control, not emotional/somatic field stabilization (Arcturus).

14.2.why: 14.2 naturally attracts resources and resents being directed, which is sovereignty over material power, not trauma-container work (Arcturus).

14.3.why: 14.3 experiments with wealth and burns energy to learn value, which is risk/reward with resources, not nervous-system repair (Arcturus).

14.4.why: 14.4 allocates resources to chosen people/missions and may gatekeep access for status; that's strategic resourcing / dominance politics, not clinical stabilization of distress (Arcturus).

14.5.why: 14.5 is expected to 'fuel' the mission and then accused of control for setting terms; that's provider/financier projection, not trauma-field healer projection (Arcturus).

14.6.why: 14.6 tries to embody 'power should serve purpose' and can judge others around money, which is moral framing of resources more than nervous-system cleanup (Arcturus).

15.1.why: 15.1 builds safety in 'people are different and that's fine,' which is radical acceptance / human dignity work (Andromeda or Pleiades themes), not clinical trauma regulation (Arcturus).

15.2.why: 15.2 radiates warm acceptance and invites people to be themselves, which is inclusion/soothing, not technical field calibration (Arcturus).

15.3.why: 15.3 lurches between extremes to learn the range of human behavior; that's destabilizing self-exploration, not stabilizing the room (Arcturus).

15.4.why: 15.4 normalizes 'our weird is our strength' for the network; that's social tolerance advocacy, not trauma triage (Arcturus).

15.5.why: 15.5 is expected to harmonize wildly different people and then blamed as fake peacemaker, which is moral/social reconciliation work, not nervous-system containment protocol (Arcturus).

15.6.why: 15.6 embodies long-term radical compassion and may judge normies, which is humanitarian permission energy, not clinical field repair (Arcturus).

16.1.why: 16.1 wants a reliable base of skill before showing off; that's craft competency, not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

16.2.why: 16.2 displays talent with enthusiasm and gets moody if asked to perform; that's performance energy, not crisis de-escalation (Arcturus).

16.3.why: 16.3 learns by bombing and refining in public; that's iterative mastery, not nervous-system repair (Arcturus).

16.4.why: 16.4 teaches technique and spreads hype for practice; that's skill evangelism, not trauma container-building (Arcturus).

16.5.why: 16.5 is called in to 'make this professional' and then seen as arrogant; that's competence policing, not emotional/somatic field cleanup (Arcturus).

16.6.why: 16.6 embodies lifetime mastery and can dismiss beginners as noise; that's elite craft identity, not clinical stabilization of a distressed group (Arcturus).
